titleStmt.title: The glories and magnificent triumphs of the blessed restitution of His Sacred Majesty K. Charles II from his arrival in Holland 1659/60 till this present, comprizing all the honours and grandeurs done to, and conferred by, Him ... / by James Heath ...
titleStmt.author: Heath, James, 1629-1664.

titleStmt.title: The glories and magnificent triumphs of the blessed restitution of His Sacred Majesty K. Charles II from his arrival in Holland 1659/60 till this present, comprizing all the honours and grandeurs done to, and conferred by, Him ... / by James Heath ...
titleStmt.author: Heath, James, 1629-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by N.G., R.H. and O.T. ...,

notesStmt.note: Another portrait of Charles II inserted as frontispiece.

"The names of His Majesties most honorable Privy Council" p. 211; "The fellows and companions of the most noble Order of St. George commonly called the Garter ..." p. 215; "A roll of the peers of the Kingdom of England ..." p. 220, etc.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
